headline: Essential Security Checks for Modern Apps

digest_items.title: Verify patch management process
digest_items.why: Unpatched systems are vulnerable to known exploits
digest_items.fix: Establish regular patching schedule and test updates before deployment

digest_items.title: Review user access permissions
digest_items.why: Stale permissions from former employees pose security risk
digest_items.fix: Conduct quarterly access reviews and remove unnecessary permissions

digest_items.title: Verify container image security
digest_items.why: Vulnerable base images introduce security risks to containerized apps
digest_items.fix: Scan images with Trivy or Clair and use minimal base images

digest_items.title: Implement network segmentation
digest_items.why: Segmentation limits lateral movement in case of breach
digest_items.fix: Separate production, staging, and development networks with firewalls

digest_items.title: Implement secure software development lifecycle
digest_items.why: Security integrated throughout SDLC is more effective than bolt-on security
digest_items.fix: Include threat modeling, security reviews, and testing in each phase
